Brooklyn Historical Society
John Barton indenture record 1974.131
1 item in 1 oversize folder
1654 OS-36
Content Description
This indenture records an exchange of lands between John Barton and Christopher Battyn, conducted in September of 1654.
Biographical / Historical
John Barton was from Down, England.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is in the public domain.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
This item was found in the repository.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); John Barton indenture record, 1974.131, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
